text: Did I miss something or is the marketplace gone now? The marketplace pages all redirect to the CMS product page
I think that is because the new marketplace is about to go live

Hey John, <@UBT0AHWLD> is correct. We recently launched a new marketplace about 2 hours ago :slightly_smiling_face: See this changelog post for more information<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/updated-asset-marketplace>
I was actually going to post this in our releases channel in a little bit here (just wanted to give some time for others to see the CMS Hub Starter announcement first :slightly_smiling_face: )
Is it going to be publicly viewable via search engines without being logged in? Because I also see any links pointing to themes/templates being redirected if you are not logged in

Hey Jacob, currently it will not be viewable. As we work towards migrating the rest of the assets over to the new marketplace framework, the marketplace will remain in-app. You provide users with this link below which will prompt them to choose their portal and then bring them to the marketplace: <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/ecosystem/marketplace/assets/>
